results.text: For the next minute, creatures who attempt to search your person for contraband make their checks at disadvantage.
Whenever you attempt to pass an item off to one of your allies without being seen, that ally gains an expertise die to their Sleight of Hand check. This bonus lasts for the next hour.

You’re quick and clever enough to multitask, even under duress. Once before the end of your next long rest, you may take the Use an Object action as an additional free action on your turn in addition to your usual free object interaction.

The next time you make a hand signal, use quick sign language, or cast a spell 2nd-level or lower with somatic components, treat this hand movement as undetectable (as per the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.5m4m8c59etfbilq9]{Metamagic: Subtle Spell} option).
You quickly pocket or palm an object without detection. You have advantage on your next Sleight of Hand check.
The next time you pickpocket an individual, you may discretely replace the item you’re stealing with another item without detection.
